SEARCH
Package emissary.directory

Class DirectoryEntryMap

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<String,DirectoryEntryList>
emissary.directory.DirectoryEntryMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ConcurrentMap<String,DirectoryEntryList>, Map<String,DirectoryEntryList>
public class DirectoryEntryMap extends ConcurrentHashMap<String,DirectoryEntryList>
Keep a map of DataID to DirectoryEntryList for the Directory Extensible to use other things for the key if desired, just override the methods that figure out the key automatically from the DirectoryEntry or DirectoryEntryList.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • addEntry

      public void addEntry(DirectoryEntry d)
      Add a directory entry to the appropriate DirectoryEntryList If it is a duplicate entry in all parts except cost, only the lowest cost entry is kept. Either this entry or the one already in the list will be discarded.
      Parameters:
      d - the entry to add

    • addEntry

      protected void addEntry(String key, DirectoryEntry d)
      Add the directory entry to the specified list
      Parameters:
      key - the key to this map
      d - the entry to add

    • allEntries

      public List<DirectoryEntry> allEntries()
      Builds a super list of all the entries currently in all buckets of the map
      Returns:
      list of all directory entries

    • allEntryKeys

      public List<String> allEntryKeys()
      Builds a super list of all the entry keys currently in all buckets of the map
      Returns:
      list of all directory entry keys

    • entryCount

      public int entryCount()
      Perform a super count of all the DirectoryEntry objects on all of the lists
      Returns:
      count of all DirectoryEntry contained in map

    • removeEntry

      public DirectoryEntry removeEntry(String entryKey)
      Remove a directory entry from the map
      Parameters:
      entryKey - for the entry to remove, not wildcarded
      Returns:
      the removed entry or null if not found

    • removeEntry

      protected DirectoryEntry removeEntry(String key, String entryKey)
      Remove the directory entry specified by entry key from the list specified by key
      Parameters:
      key - the key to this map
      entryKey - the key of the DirectoryEntry to remove
      Returns:
      the removed object

    • removeAllMatching

      public List<DirectoryEntry> removeAllMatching(String key)
      Remove all entries that match the key returning them as a list
      Parameters:
      key - the key that must be matched (can be wildcarded)
      Returns:
      list of entries that were removed from the map

    • removeAllMatching

      public List<DirectoryEntry> removeAllMatching(String key, long checkpoint)
      Remove all entries that match the key returning them as a list
      Parameters:
      key - the key that must be matched (can be wildcarded)
      checkpoint - only remove entries older than this value, use Long.MAX_VALUE to have all matching entries removed without regard to their age
      Returns:
      list of entries that were removed from the map

    • removeAllOnDirectory

      public List<DirectoryEntry> removeAllOnDirectory(String key)
      Find and remove all entries on a directory
      Parameters:
      key - the key of the directory
      Returns:
      list of all entries removed

    • removeAllOnDirectory

      Parameters:
      key - the key of the directory

      Returns:
      list of all entries removed

      Returns:
